DataElement.preferredName: Autologous Peripheral Blood Cell Product Collection Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to indicator whether an autologous blood cell product was produced during a pheresis procedure.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (aw-TAHL-o-gus) Taken from an individual's own tissues, cells, or DNA._A general term describing the three cellular components of blood (white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets), all which are made in the bone marrow. (Lymphoma Information Network Glossary)_The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
